message: Starting content analysis for Weeks 3-4 (Learning and Motivation). Reading extracted PDF text files.
Successfully read Week 3 (Learning) and Week 4 (Motivation) content. Now examining JSON structure to understand format requirements.
Beginning systematic extraction of Week 3 (Learning) key concepts: Classical conditioning, Operant conditioning, Cognitive learning theories
Completed comprehensive content analysis document with 20+ key concepts for each week. Now creating additional structured JSON format summary for developers.

Finalizing deliverables. Created 3 comprehensive documents: (1) Full analysis with all concepts and studies, (2) Structured JSON data, (3) Quick reference summary for JSON generation. Performing final quality check.

COMPLETED: Weeks 3-4 content analysis. Deliverables: (1) weeks_3-4_content_analysis.md - 339 lines with 18 key concepts, 16 theorists, 17 studies, comparison tables, and 33 quiz topics; (2) weeks_3-4_structured_data.json - 14KB structured data ready for JSON generation; (3) WEEK_3-4_SUMMARY.md - Quick reference with implementation guidelines. Week 3 (Learning): Classical conditioning, Operant conditioning, Cognitive approaches, Preparedness, Learned helplessness. Week 4 (Motivation): Drive, Instinct, Arousal, Expectancy-Value, Intrinsic-Extrinsic, Achievement theories. All learning outcomes documented, key studies referenced, examples extracted. Quality verified - ready for Phase 2 JSON generation.
